thread.title: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan
thread.title_full: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan

title: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan
text:
> Top News GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan Republican presidential candidate, Ohio Gov. John Kasich announces his federal budget plan, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, at Nashua Community College in Nashua, N.H. (AP Photo/Jim Cole) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
